sudo port selfupdate sudo port upgrade outdated sudo port install postgresql92-server
To create a database instance, after install do sudo mkdir -p /opt/local/var/db/postgresql92/data sudo chown postgres:postgres /opt/local/var/db/postgresql92/data sudo su postgres -c '/opt/local/lib/postgresql92/bin/initdb -D /opt/local/var/db/postgresql92/data'
Success. You can now start the database server using: sudo -u postgres /opt/local/lib/postgresql92/bin/postgres -D /opt/local/var/db/postgresql92/data or /opt/local/lib/postgresql92/bin/pg_ctl -D /opt/local/var/db/postgresql92/data -l logfile start
